message: I'll be driving in Saturday morning from Ann Arbor.  I'm not sure if I'll make it in before noon though, unless I somehow manage to defy my sleep schedule and get up by 5AM.

cool!  Hmm, I wonder if we could quickly pick up a map to do the stick-pins-in thing...
